title: Japanese Fusion Beef Roll with Soy and Red Wine Sauce
ingredients: ['400g thinly sliced beef', 'Salt & pepper, to taste', '1/4 onion, thinly sliced', '1/2 red pepper, julienned', '100g Asian mushrooms with long stems', '8 slices of thinly sliced Provolone Cheese', '2 tablespoons salad oil, or as needed', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '8 tablespoons red wine', '1/2 to 3/4 tablespoon butter']
